name: Twars - Episode 1: Evil DNA.
description: ### Evil DNA With leave of the commander Raynor, for a suicidal mission to rescue Sara in Char, the Separator Group of Mar Sara at the command of Captain Rico. has a mission to retrieve a sample of hybrid DNA. The Supremacy is transporting the sample to the Central Laboratory in Korhal. Good Luck. - A primary objectives and extra achievements. - Play in : Easy, Normal, Hard and Very Hard modes. - A secret bonus mission. enjoy :)
author: _ForgeUser5757796
